Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal document dated Pakhons of year 17 of Ptolemy III Euergetes I: 5 ll. on recto, list of 16 witnesses on verso. Resolution of dispute concerning use of a house: Djufakhy son of Amenothes cedes use of house to a woman (name lost). Scribe Khensthotes son of Horos.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.66-7, pl.54-5)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2737) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2737)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink Supported locally: gelatin Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather (deteriorated) Binding: masking tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete - left end of text missing
